confirmation_text: Be sure to review your information carefully before continuing. Once you confirm, you can choose to print now or send the completed form to yourself to print and mail upon receipt.
acknowledge_heading: You will be asked to attest to the following when you sign your completed and printed form.
acknowledge_text: I have reviewed my state's instructions and I swear/affirm that: I am a United States citizen I meet the eligibility requirements of my state and subscribe to any oath required. The information I have provided is true to the best of my knowledge under penalty of perjury. If I have provided false information, I may be fined, imprisoned, or (if not a U.S. citizen) deported from or refused entry to the United States.
